name: Universe of Eulogies
description:
This game is the best of the thousands of RPG Maker games which have used the default tile sets/actors/sound effects/animations etc...

You may know what I'm talking about. Well I have sunk hours of my life into this. It's up to you to determine wither those hours mean anything or not.

Worst case scenario, you waste your time but you never know, hell I don't even know but maybe this could be worth something.
